overview: Specially written for Aiden Shaw's return to the Falcon Family, 'Addiction, Parts 1 and 2' explores a sultry nightclub where Aiden and 17 other hot, demanding men - including Falcon Exclusives Josh Weston, Brad Patton, Justin Dragon, Tommy Brandt, and Maxx Diesel as well as newcomer Ken Houser - meet up to quench their desires and explore the core of lust. Once you've tasted 'Addiction' you'll keep coming back for more.
title: Addiction
